objects.description: [BeaverTail](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1246) has been known to collect basic system information.(Citation: Esentire ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2024)(Citation: PaloAlto ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret November 2023) [BeaverTail](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1246) has also collected data to include hostname and current timestamp prior to uploading data to the API endpoint `/uploads` on the C2 server.(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)
